# Orphan External Repositories

## Purpose
Local clones or checkouts used for quick grepping, patching, or reference. These are git-ignored and not committed to the repository.

## Maintenance
Keep this `README.md` tracked.

## Common Repositories

### intranet-info

Contains private intranet configurations (hosts, keys, credentials).

To set it up:
```bash
cd extern/orphan
gh repo clone intranet-info
```
